class_notes: This class is for InEmory MN semester 4 students only.
course_description: Students will examine, within ambulatory, and transitions of care settings, influences of community environment, public policies, and fiscal constraints relating to patient and family self-empowerment, optimal clinical outcomes, and high quality care delivery.
